channel.title: 1st-post on One Way Conversation from a Cranky Sysadmin
channel.description: Recent content in 1st-post on One Way Conversation from a Cranky Sysadmin

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I used to run a wordpress site at this location. Maintaining WP was tedious with all of the security updates, so I’m going to try a static site generator. I selected Hugo because it seems easy to use. Topics may or may not include: Electronics Amateur Radio Sysadmin Rants Programming Gaming Navel Gazing
